text: This is a list of television programs currently or formerly broadcast on Cartoon Network and Max's preschool block, Cartoonito (and its predecessor unbranded block and Tickle U) in the United States. ==Current programming== ===Original programming=== ====Warner Bros. Animation==== Title Premiere date Source(s) Bugs Bunny Builders July 25, 2022 Batwheels October 15, 2022 ===Programming from PBS Kids=== Title Premiere date Source(s) Sesame Street November 11, 2021 ===Acquired programming=== Title Premiere date Source(s) Little Baby Bum September 13, 2021 Mo Willems Storytime Shorts September 13, 2021 Vlad and Niki March 18, 2022 Bea's Block February 15, 2024 Hop April 4, 2024 Lu & the Bally Bunch October 1, 2024 Silly Sundays October 2, 2024 Let's Go Bananas October 3, 2024 Barney's World October 14, 2024 ===Short- form programming=== Title Premiere date Source(s) Batwheels shorts September 5, 2022 Bugs Bunny Builders shorts October 31, 2022 ==Upcoming programming== ===Original programming=== ====Cartoon Network Studios==== Title Premiere date Source(s) Heyo BMO TBA ====Hanna-Barbera Studios Europe==== Title Premiere date Source(s) Foster's Funtime for Imaginary Friends TBA Barbara! ===Acquired programming=== Title Premiere date Source(s) Dylan's Playtime Adventures 2025 Unlimited Squirrels! ==Former programming== ===Original programming=== ====Cartoon Network Studios==== Title Premiere date End date Source(s) Care Bears: Unlock the Magic April 16, 2019 October 21, 2024 Jessica's Big Little World September 20, 2023 January 20, 2025 ====Warner Bros.
